items.sentence: They carried on with the construction in the face of strong opposition from the residents.
Tom gets on well with both of his sisters, but things are a bit strained with his brother.
Tom studied the map to see if he could find a shorter way to get to where he wanted to go.
I always thought that a stroke was one of nature's ways to tell you that it's time to die.
Tom couldn't speak French very well, so it was difficult for him to communicate with Mary.
